Author: tkbx
Title: [ANN] BCT by CG Blockchain - Join Token Sale on March 1st!
Body: TELEGRAM | WEBSITE | TWITTER FACEBOOK | MEDIUM | REDDIT  JOIN THE BCT TOKEN SALE TODAY! PRESALE IS OPEN NOW    TELEGRAM | WEBSITE | TWITTER FACEBOOK | MEDIUM | REDDIT  JOIN THE BCT TOKEN SALE TODAY! PRESALE IS OPEN NOW  Please be aware of the fact, that a Contribution within the TGE (Token Generation Event) is not a form of investment, but a Contribution into a Smart Contract System for the generation of BCT Tokens. The BCT Tokens confer only the right to provide and receive Services in the Network and confer no other rights of any form with respect to the Network or Company, including, but not limited to, any voting, distribution, redemption, liquidation, proprietary (including all forms of intellectual property), or other financial or legal rights. Participants in the TGE understand and accept that the BCT Tokens are not intended to be a digital currency, security, commodity or any other kind of financial instrument and may lose all value.
